nodes.text: Flood basalt was a type of basalt found on the planet Mustafar. Around 14 BBY, the Imperial architect Colonel Alva Brenne came to Mustafar to design a personal base for the Dark Lord of the Sith Darth Vader. While surveying the planet's fiery terrain, she encountered flood basalt along Mustafar's lava flows, later instructing Lieutenant Roggo to run tests on the strength of the substance so that she might incorporate it into Vader's fortress.
Flood basalt was mentioned in Darth Vader: Dark Lord of the Sith 21, a comic book written by Charles Soule and published by Marvel Comics on September 12, 2018.
